channel.title: Home on mimvoid's little corner

item.description: Page Not Found Uh oh! This page does not exist…

item.title: Credits
item.description: Tools Of course, I can’t thank Neocities enough for providing people a way to host their website! I used their built-in editor at first, but soon switched to my preferred editor. It’s thanks to the Neocities CLI that I can edit this website on my computer and upload the files later. Speaking of my preferred editor, I like Neovim! Unlike Neocities’ editor (as far as I know), it supports LSPs (language server protocols) that can spot errors in your code and provide suggestions.
